game.name: Drift King
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Grab your favorite car, tune it, challenge players in Online Drift battles and become a DRIFT KING!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Grab your favorite car, tune it, challenge players in Online Drift battles and become a DRIFT KING!
